hadiths.text: Abdullah narrated:"The Prophet would say the Salam from his right and from his left (saying): (As-Salamu alaikum wa rahmatullah, as-Salamu alaikum wa rahmatullah) 'Peace be upon you, and Allah's mercy. Peace be upon you, and Allah's mercy

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي التَّسْلِيمِ فِي الصَّلاَةِ
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About The Taslim For Salat
